main event: Witnesses observed a bright circular light hovering near Stanley, Idaho on May 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and hovered at an altitude of about 1000 feet., Observers reported the light changing colors and performing erratic maneuvers., The duration of observation was about 10-15 minutes., The witnesses described the object as silent and disappearing rapidly from sight., No photographic evidence was captured during the sighting.
witness description: Observers included several individuals during a nighttime observation.
